mapper.select: SELECT LPAD('-', 6*(LEVEL-1)) || DEPT_NAME DEPT_NAME, DEPT_ID ,CASE WHEN UPPER_DEPT_ID = '1' THEN '경영지원팀' WHEN UPPER_DEPT_ID = '2' THEN '회계' WHEN UPPER_DEPT_ID = '3' THEN '인사' WHEN UPPER_DEPT_ID = '4' THEN '연구관리팀' WHEN UPPER_DEPT_ID = '5' THEN '개발' WHEN UPPER_DEPT_ID = '6' THEN '테스트' WHEN UPPER_DEPT_ID = '7' THEN '회사' ELSE '없음' END AS UPPER_DEPT_ID FROM DEPARTMENT START WITH DEPT_NAME='회사' CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID=UPPER_DEPT_ID
